select pr.id, pr.user_id, pr.record_code, pr.create_date, pr.del_flag, pr.total_price, pr.status, ui.name, ui.images, ui.id_card, ui.phone, datediff(pr.create_date,curdate()) as checkDay from purchase_record pr left join user_info ui on (ui.id = pr.user_id) where 1 = 1 and pr.del_flag = '0'
AND pr.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{purchaseRecord.status},'%')
AND pr.record_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{purchaseRecord.recordCode},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{purchaseRecord.userName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{purchaseRecord.userId}
order by pr.create_date desc

select pg.id, pg.purchase_code, pg.commodity_id, pg.out_num, pg.item_price, ci.name, ci.model, ci.images from purchase_goods pg left join commodity_info ci on (ci.id = pg.commodity_id) where 1 = 1 and pg.purchase_code = #{ recordCode }
